# nupelia

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Pacote de auxílio para relatórios do PELD

## Installation

You can install the development version of nupelia from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Nupelia/nupelia")
```
